page.title: 18EDUCATION
page.content:
separate free-standing classrooms and is placed in extensive playing fields and grounds. A small Berkshire County Public Library shares the same site.
{Cookham Nursery School}(situated near the{Pound)}was established in the early 1970's and admits children for one to two years before they enter full time education at five years old. The children attend for half a day only on each of the normal school days - Monday to Friday. They learn early skills eg. in number, letters, hand control, simple crafts - all in a play-like setting. Approximiately 60 children attend at either the morning or afternoon sessions of the school. The children leave the nursery when they are five and will attend one of the local Primary Schools until they are eleven years old.
